page.description: Returns active field rule information for this field.
page.discussion: The .RULES_GET() method returns the field rules for the field. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example shows that the product_id field has no case conversion rules.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim fld as P dim rules as P tbl = table.open("invoice.set") fld = tbl.field_get("INVOICE_ITEMS->PRODUCT_ID") rules = fld.rules_get() ? rules.Case_Convert ? "None"
